faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About CopyWeb
faq.description: Have another question? Contact us at support@copyweb.net

items.question: How can I import my designs into CopyWeb?
items.answer: We support various workflows: paste a live URL to clone a site, upload screenshots of your mockups, or use our direct Figma integration to sync designs instantly. Every input is processed with pixel-perfect precision.

items.question: What is the technology behind the AI code generation?
items.answer: Our advanced engine performs a structural analysis of your visual input, identifying UI patterns, layout hierarchies, and styling tokens. It then reconstructs the design as modular, maintainable code optimized for your specific framework.

items.question: Which frontend frameworks are currently supported?
items.answer: You can export your designs to React, Vue.js, and semantic HTML/CSS. For our Premium users, we provide advanced project structures for industrial-strength frameworks like Next.js and Nuxt.js.

items.question: Can I refine the code before exporting it?
items.answer: Absolutely. CopyWeb features an integrated online editor that allows you to live-preview changes, tweak component logic, and adjust styling in real-time, ensuring the final export meets your exact requirements.

items.question: Is the output quality suitable for production environments?
items.answer: Yes. We prioritize clean, optimized, and accessible code. The generated assets include fully responsive layouts, optimized images, and well-organized CSS—following modern web development standards and best practices.

items.question: Does CopyWeb handle backend logic or API connections?
items.answer: Our primary focus is currently on high-fidelity frontend generation. While you can easily integrate your own backend services into the exported components, we are actively developing future updates to automate API and data management.
